DOC.detailed_description: Recent data suggest early virologic response HIV intervention may predictive long-term virologic outcome . Defining early decay viral load carefully perform study viral dynamic may useful tool assess likely outcome long-term treatment . It may also useful screen tool define combination study . In main study , viral load decay rate estimate HIV-infected , treatment-naive participant receive RAL FTC/TDF . The A5248 study last approximately 72 week . All participant take RAL FTC/TDF 72 week .
